apiVersion: apps/v1

  name: calculator-deployment

  replicas: 5
  strategy:
    type: RollingUpdate
    rollingUpdate:

      maxSurge: 0

      app: calculator
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:

    spec:

        ports:
        - containerPort: 8080
        readinessProbe:
          httpGet:
             path: /sum?a=1&b=2
             port: 8080
